review.title: Excellent location great breakfast
review.reviewText: I really enjoyed my stay w holiday inn express. Great location great breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: No.  1 great great location.  Room was nice.
review.negativeRemarks: Every room should have a safety bar in the shower. More space is needed between the sofa sleeper and the bed. Room 378 the bathroom door needs improvi
review.locationRemarks: Great location.

review.title: Close to everything
review.reviewText: Hotel is clean, it is in the fisherman's wharf so close to all the restaurants, shopping, tour company (grayline office is just around the corner). Breakfast is complete from scrambled egg to bagels, yogurt, fruit, milk etc.
review.negativeRemarks: no fridge in the room, no free water either.
review.locationRemarks: Good location, quiet and close to everything just Don't go home too late.. streets are not well lit.

review.title: Excellent!
review.reviewText: Close to everything! Great breakfast and wonderful staff!

review.title: Great location and staff
review.reviewText: Great location, close to many attractions and transportation.  Staff was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: Refrigerators and microwaves in the room, sink outside of the bathroom
review.locationRemarks: Short walk to the Wharf

review.reviewText: Hotel room was nice and specious. Lots of options on the complementary breakfast. Great location, steps away from Fishermans Wharf.

review.title: great location
review.reviewText: location on fisherman's wharf was excellent. However, there was no pool, gym, restaurant or bar. The breakfast though was wonderful. Very expensive  and beware of all the added taxes.

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: Great location to Fishermens Warf as discribed on website, clean and nice staff.

review.title: Good hotel
review.reviewText: Great breakfast but unlike other Holiday Inn Expresses THERE IS NO REFRIGERATOR OR MICROWAVE--big Negative. Close to all the action at Fishermans Warf

review.title: wonderful
review.reviewText: best stay  I have had in a while includes all hotel I stayed,last 3 years

review.title: Liked the location
review.reviewText:
It's located close to fishermens wharf and pier 39
We booked 2 rooms and they were quite far apart which I did not like
Breakfast was good but not great
The receptionist was not very friendly when I asked for a replacement key when it did not work. He seemed to think that it was my fault that it did not work!!
Overall I liked this hotel because of its location and that's about it

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Very nice will do again great location..............................

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Easy walking distance to all wharf attractions. Very helpful and knowledgeable staff. The free breakfast was a nice bonus. We will definitely stay there on our next trip
review.negativeRemarks: We had no issues
review.locationRemarks: Alcatraz tour, ferry to Napa and the wine country. Pier 39 and all its shops and restaurants

review.reviewText: Walking distance to lots of great sights. The staff was friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Walked to wharf, piers, cable car, china town from hotel. Breakfast and plenty of room for sitting.

review.title: Great hotel, very close to attractions.
review.reviewText: Had a great time in San Francisco!! Hotel very nice and within walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf, cable cars, and the famous Buena Vista cafe. Highly reccomend.
Close to waterfront and restaurants. Quiet street

review.title: Close to everything
review.reviewText: Fast check-in, breakfast was a little crowded in the mornings had trouble finding a place to sit. Room was comfortable

review.title: Nice close to piers
review.reviewText: Hotel has pool NEXT DOOR, at the hotel next block. Breakfast the same every day, but close to other restaurants and plenty of things to do outside hotel....
Good location. Staff not friendly. Parking expensive

review.title: Wonderful hotel close to The Embarcadero.
review.reviewText: Our first experience at a Holiday Inn Express and it was wonderful!  A great hotel close to The Embarcadero with a warm and welcoming staff.  We would definitely stay here on our next visit!

review.title: Great Location, Helpful Staff and Breakfast!!
review.reviewText: Stayed at the Holiday Inn Express July 20-25, 2016 - great hotel!! Location was perfect to everywhere we wanted to go - even walked to Chinatown - about 1 mile away since it was a beautiful day!  Staff was so helpful and friendly and having breakfast included was such a savings!!  I would highly recommend.

review.title: On road trip and heading home , this was perfect.
review.reviewText:
Wonderful staff, and in perfect spot for sightseeing! If late arrival local yelp has places that deliver to your room inexpensive.
Suggestions for breakfast the cafe on the corner amazing and great for kids ! Hotel was overall an A+

review.title: Convenience, location and breakfast
review.reviewText: I was pleased with the location of Holiday Inn Express.  I was in walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf, Ghirardelli and Trader Joes.  I also walked past Safeway.  Great location and I woke up to a nice breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, pleasant staff and there was even cardio machines.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing much for the price.
review.locationRemarks: Lots to see near by in walking distance

review.title: Location, location, location ...
review.reviewText: I parked my vehicle and walked everywhere, close to the cable carts, Fisherman Wharf (Pier 39), Pier 33 where we caught the fairy to Alcatraz ... came with my boys, parents and nephew, love San Francisco. Free breakfast made it convenient so we can get on the go.
review.locationRemarks: Shopping, food, site seeing ... loved IT!

review.title: Very nice hotel perfectly situated for the tourist
review.reviewText: We did not rent a car or have a car. This hotel made it so easy to spend our days walking, taking a cable car or a street car, or renting a bike to see everything in the city!  We spent for fabulous days there. Busy from morning till night seeing the sights and having fun.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Close to main attractions, bus stops. Wxcellent breakfast

review.title: Great location & great breakfast!
review.reviewText: My husband and I were very pleased with the hotel's location as it was in a great location - close to shops, restaurants, the piers, and public transportation.  It was very clean and comfortable and the staff (particularly the front desk) were very friendly.  We also really appreciated the breakfast that was included which was much more than we were expecting (pancakes, eggs, sausage, cereal, oatmeal, bagels, toast, cinnamon rolls, juice, coffee, yogurt and fruit).  Since San Francisco is so spendy, it was nice to not have to pay for at least one of our meals each day.  We were only disappointed by 2 things: 1) our view (which was a building with windows only a few yards away) and 2) no pool (Of course, it was my fault for not noticing on the website that there was no pool).  Other than that - we had a great stay and would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast that was included - was much more than we were expecting!
review.locationRemarks: It is just a few blocks from the pier with tons of shops and restaurants nearby.  And very convenient for public transportation to all the attractions

review.title: comfortable hotel close to fisherman's wharf.
review.reviewText: Our room was very comfortable and the breakfast in the morning was ok.  It was just a short walk to the wharf.  We took a hop on hop off bus tour and there is a stop very close to the hotel.
Perfect location for warf area.  Alittle pricey plus you have to pay for parking.

review.title: Great hotel close to cable cars and the Wharf
review.reviewText: We stayed on the ground floor and it was very quiet.  It was close to a Safeway to pick up some food for lunch and etc.
review.negativeRemarks: Would like to have a small refrigerator in the room.
review.locationRemarks: Near Pier 39, a short walk to Ghiradhelli Square.

review.title: Location, location, location!
review.reviewText: The hotel was an easy stroll to all of the attractions in the Fisherman's Wharf area.  It couldn't have been located in a better spot: Close enough to walk, but just far enough to be away from the crowds.  The staff was friendly and efficient, and the room was clean and ready for us at check-in.  And the room was spacious and comfortable enough to accommodate a roll-away bed in addition to the 2 queens.  Great value!

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: I really appreciated that they let me drop my luggage and use their safety deposit box 5 hours before the planned check in time. That little courtesy made a huge difference in my one day visit to San Francisco.

review.title: OK hotel just 2 blocks from Fisherman's Wharf.
review.reviewText: Everything was fine except the breakfast area is to small for the amount of people. This is a vacation hotel and as such most vacationers eat breakfast between 9 - 9:30. Not nearly enough seating to accommodate everyone. After the first 2 days  we found it easier to just go out for breakfast. The only problems with this is your breakfast is included in the price for the room and it cost around $40 for going out, but I didn't have to eat standing up in a corner.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast area

review.title: Hotel @ SanFran
review.reviewText: Unless you are knowledgable about the city I would def. suggest the Hop on Hop off tours.  We learned so much through them.  My husband loved the cold weather (54 degrees in July), I on the other hand froze.  Make sure that you bring suitable clothing for all climates.  Loved touring the wine country - drastic change in temp.-85 degrees.  One of our best vacations!
review.positiveRemarks: We arrived early and they accommodated our luggage and provided a room as soon as possible (early).  Great location to the piers, Concierge was very h
review.locationRemarks: We walked to everything that we wanted to do or used the Hop on Hop off bus.

review.title: Great location, amenities and staff.
review.reviewText: Location is two blocks off the piers of Fisherman's Wharf closest to Pier 45. Free breakfast and a concierge for all guests. Rewards members also get free wifi and late checkout. Staff was super helpful and my room was spotless. The concierge helped me understand the public transit and I felt like a pro when we left.

review.title: Great Location!
review.reviewText: The hotel was right by Fisherman's Wharf.  Public transportation was easy to get to from the hotel. The breakfast offered had a wide variety of foods. There was added security in that you had to use your key card in order to get up the elevator from the lobby.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the comfort of the bed and that two types of pillows were offered.  Loved that a buffet breakfast was included.
review.locationRemarks: The location was perfect for getting to the wharf and the piers.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Grate location close to fishermans warf! Nice complimentary breakfast in the morning.

review.title: Great time in San Francisco
review.reviewText: The hotel is everything you want from a Holiday Inn Express. Clean, good size room, refrig, micro, breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to transportation. Extra couch in room.
review.negativeRemarks: The only thing wrong was the pool was located in a different hotel so didn't get to experience it.
review.locationRemarks: It's on the wharf.  We rented a GOcar they use a GPS you drive and it takes you on a  guided tour with information about the city.

review.title: The got my room wrong and would not adjust.
review.reviewText: Gave me wrong handicap room and charged me for a deluxe room.

Hotel is close to tourist activities and public transportation. Free breakfast to start a family before a day of activities. Can be noisy (older windows) due to buses often coming and going and sitting idle on the street.
review.positiveRemarks: Free breakfast reduces meal costs. Close to transportation and tourist activities.
review.negativeRemarks: Noisy area. Buses often park outside and idle.
review.locationRemarks: Close to Fisherman's Warf for shopping/food and tourist activities. Close to transportation (Warf/Market street car end of the line)

review.title: Nice hotel. Reception and concierge very helpful
review.reviewText: Breakfasts excellent to start the day on a positive note. Facilities very good. The nightly tarrif is excessive in the peak season.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff and helpful regarding local interests etc.
review.negativeRemarks: Reduce the peak season  nightly tariff.
review.locationRemarks: Very good location for waterfront activities etc.

review.title: Great hotel with excellent location!
review.reviewText: This hotel was just what we needed for our trip. It was clean, had a friendly staff, fabulous choice of breakfast items (hot or cold) and located a few blocks from the water. It was ideal walking distance to a lot of attractions so we didn't bother renting a car. I would highly recommend this hotel!

review.title: Excellent location!
review.reviewText: Easy to find, excellent location, very clean and great breakfast included in price!

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel is close to fisherman's wharf and a lot of options where to eat and visit.  The service is great, they offer free breakfast which is great...you can grab something quick in the morning before any plan you have, the rooms are clean. Overall experience was perfect!

review.title: Great location, modern hotel
review.reviewText: Comfy bed, helpful staff, nice breakfast and convenient and safe location

review.title: Great Location, clean
review.reviewText: The location was great for tourist attractions.  The room was very clean and comfortable.

review.title: LOVE THIS HOTEL
review.reviewText: Everything about the hotel is awesome! :) Everything - the gym, the front desk, the customer service, the cleanliness, everything is great.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything - the gym, the front desk, the customer service, the cleanliness, everything.
review.negativeRemarks: The gritty feeling in the showers - freaks me out.

review.title: Walk to Ghirardelli Square, Maritime Museum
review.reviewText: Stayed here a few times. Walking distance to many must-see sights. Lots of restaurants to choose from. Quiet night's sleep!

review.title: Comfortable rooms great location
review.reviewText: Does what it says on the tin. Good location comfy room

review.title: Very clean hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is nothing fancy but the rooms are very clean and comfortable. Also, great location!

review.title: Nice hotel Close to everything.
review.reviewText: Love the complementary  breakfast.the complementary news paper.overall a good experience.

review.title: Nice Hotel close to EVERYTHING!
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean, staff was great! No complaints! Walking distance to everything.

review.title: Quiet hotel close to Fisherman Wharf
review.reviewText: Had mini suite because there were 4 adults... It had a little kitchenette which was nice with sink,frig,micro....the bathroom was very small....

review.title: Nice place to stay that is close to everything
review.reviewText: This hotel is nice and clean with nice people who work there.  It is in a convenient location a couple blocks from Fisherman's Wharf.  Plus the price to stay there isn't too expensive compared to others near it.

review.title: Nice clean hotel
review.reviewText:
I stayed one night for a business trip. The hotel was in a very convenient location. The room was clean with a view to the courtyard. Breakfast was good but I was surprised by how many people was there for breakfast.
There were two other holiday inn hotel buildings next door. I was confused at first and tried to check in at the wrong hotel.

review.title: Close to Pier 39 and Ghiradelli Square
review.reviewText: We just left and this was our first time in SF. Everything was great and the breakfast was better than expected. Thanks again!

review.title: Holiday Hotel Express on Point street
review.reviewText: The hotel met and exceeded our expectations. We had two wonderful breakfasts, beds great and pillows were fantastic.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Great Location, Helpful Staff, Clean Hotel, Good Breakfast Buffet.

review.title: Great staff
review.reviewText: After a terrible ride from airport to hotel on a shuttle we thought this was going to be a bad trip. And this was our first time here. After finally getting to the hotel the staff was so nice out trip was turned around instantly and from there on had a great time. Hotel was quit, clean and breakfast was amazing. From Brandi at front desk to valet, thank you! Your kidness and help made our experience one worth coming back.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: It doesn't seem close to many attractions but it is actually very convenient, a 2 min walk to the cable car that takes you to the CBD, a 5 min walk to the wharves that take you to Alcatraz and Sausalito, literally 10 second walk to the hop on and off.
review.positiveRemarks: Checking in/out super fast, free wifi, breakfast was not wonderful but tasty and convenient (especially if in a hurry to catch a tour). Location.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast could start earlier (say 6am rather than 6.30) otherwise there is little time to eat and catch a tour.

review.title: nice hotel and clean
review.reviewText: Very happy with the staff, hotel is very new with comfy beds. Great variety from the complimentary breakfast

review.title: Great stay!
review.reviewText: Wonderful location, friendly & helpful staff.  Room was very clean, quiet location, but a tad small.  No fridge etc.  Breakfast was good, varied & plentiful which was great considering the high price of food in the area.

review.title: Love hotel loved location!
review.reviewText: Best experience hotel service great. San Francisco best city im in love with this city. I will definitely be back!!

review.title: Clean hotel with free hot breakfast
review.reviewText: You wouldn't expect much from a Holiday Express hotel, but I was quite pleased with my stay. The staff accommodated my request for an early check-in without question. The room was a bit on the smaller side, but it was cozy and clean. I had troubles with my heater blowing out cold air after the first night but I was barely in my room so it wasn't enough to complain about. The hot breakfast was why I booked the hotel, but it's close proximity to all of the festivities of Fisherman's Warf as well as lots of restaurants made it my current favorite hotel in SF. I will be back in the pricing aligns.
review.positiveRemarks: The hot breakfast wasn't fancy but it was a huge plus in a city where breakfast costs you $10-15 a meal. It was honestly my favorite feature.
review.negativeRemarks: I would like to see a mini fridge in the rooms. The ice bucket could have been cleaner. My heater also blew out cold air after the first night.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is in the heart of Fisherman's Warf. There are TONS of tourist shops, restaurants, and fish shacks selling seafood.

review.title: Great Location!
review.reviewText: Within walking distance to dining, shopping and entertainment.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Wharf, Pier 39, Ghirardelli Square, Cable/Trolley Car

review.title: Clean hotel, great location & breakfast
review.reviewText: Hotel was only 2 blocks from Wharf and the two cable car turn-arounds. Plenty of restaurants and tour options. Free breakfast was plentiful/excellent. Concierge & valet parking personnel were friendly & very helpful. Taxis available out front. ONLY complaint is that our room on the first floor at the back of the hotel was within 20' of the noisy "train" that went by until late in the evening, but even that was easily bearable.

review.title: Modern hotel in the heart of Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: My family and I stayed for four nights and had a great experience. The staff was very friendly, the room was clean and comfortable, and the free breakfast was much better than the usual continental fare. The location can't be beat, one block to fisherman's wharf, one block to the trolley turn around at Powell Street.

review.title: Very Convenient
review.reviewText: We found everything to be better than expected. Very convenient location to local attractions & public transportation. Having a breakfast buffet was so helpful since we brought two grandchildren with us. Would definitely return to this hotel when in San Francisco.

review.title: A hotel by Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: The hotel is ok.  Too dang pricy for what it's worth though.  When we got there at night our toilet in our room was out of commission.  They did come and fix it within 10 minutes.   I just think the price is way too high.   I may not stay there again when visiting San Fransisco.  Just sayin'!

review.title: Nice Hotel but that's all
review.reviewText: The hotel was nice, clean and in a great location but there are no extras. I could not get a cup of coffee anywhere in the hotel until 6:30 a.m. Not good if you get up at 5 like I do. There are no extras or amenities in this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Put a coffee pot in the rooms and frig.

review.title: good location to fisher and wharf and tour bus
review.reviewText: Good service, good breakfast.  Staff was helpful to help plan and arrange bus tour, wine tour, and selection of places to eat

review.title: Location is great
review.reviewText: Staff was very accommodating; rooms were very clean; excellent breakfast; location is ideal for various attractions
review.positiveRemarks: It should be rated 4 or 5 star
review.negativeRemarks: We were very pleased with everything.
review.locationRemarks: It is ideally located for the Wharf, cable car, availability for variety of tours

review.title: Great Location to Fisherman's Warf
review.reviewText: Great stay! Clean and comfy room, staff was friendly and very helpful, really enjoyed the breakfast! Best part was location, super easy to walk to Fisherman's Warf and easy short drive to city where we had business to do. Overall extremely happy with our choice to stay here.
review.positiveRemarks: comfy bed, clean, and the convenient good breakfast

review.title: Fantastic Location!
review.reviewText:
The hotel was in a fantastic location, walking distance to Pier 39 and all the action at Fisherman's Warf!   The valet cost is $50/ night so we rented a car each day we needed it from Enterprise (less than 2 blocks away) it was SUPER easy and convenient!   

The free breakfast was amazing and super nice, especially when traveling with children.   One of my little ones has terrible allergies, she could eat almost everything there- they had all the info there for me to read so that was very nice and made her feel pretty "normal" as opposed to some of the issues we have at other restaurants.

The bathrooms weren't anything special, but the rooms were clean and the water pressure was good.   You are IN the action so there was some noise from the outside at night, but nothing that was loud enough to wake the children.   I think you must expect this if you are going to stay in the city.

We were VERY happy with our choice.
review.negativeRemarks: Valet costs (but what can you really do about that?)
review.locationRemarks: Pier 39, car rental, restaurants, shops, etc

review.title: Great location & clean rooms
review.reviewText: Just a short walk to many tourist spots.  The free breakfast is delicious.  Clean rooms, friendly staff.

The Hotel was great, 
Expedia on the other hand was not so great. I booked 3 rooms and was charged $300+ each for 4 rooms totaling a deposit of $1200+.
 When I arrived Expedia had me booked for 6 rooms.
I was never informed there would be a $300+ charge for a deposit on each room. 
The remainder of the balance will be refunded however the cash flow was not expected. 
Not Happy with the service Expedia provided...

I got this hotel on an "Express Deal" and was pleasently surprised at how well everything turned out. The staff was very friendly, good breakfast choices, and right near Fisherman's Wharf! It was also 2 blocks from a trolley stop which was super easy for me to get back and forth from to the Bart/Airport. The hotel also has a shuttle to and from the airport for a resonable price. I would def come back.

review.title: Good location for the area.
review.reviewText: Very friendly staff and willing to help. Great location for Fishermans Wharf

review.title: Great place to stay near Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: This hotel is only a couple of blocks from the Wharf.  Nearby shopping and other sight seeing within walking distance.  The hotel staff is great, especially Brandy!  The free breakfast is okay but I had expected scrambled eggs where I read somewhere but there was none.  However, there are places to eat very nearby the hotel if you want to go out for breakfast.  Hotel rooms are nice and clean and the entire staff was always friendly and very helpful.  We really enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning soon.
review.negativeRemarks: Have scrambled eggs in the breakfast area.
review.locationRemarks: Lots of things within walking distance.  Ghiradelli Square, Fisherman's Wharf area, Golden Gate bridge by bicycle, Alcatraz Island pier, submarine.

review.reviewText: The room was clean and comfortable. We never ran out of hot water and had a good HD TV. The breakfast included was good and had a good selection of food to choose from. Hotel is walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf were there great selection of restaurants. Public transportation is only a couple blocks away.

review.title: good position, great staff
review.reviewText: we found the hotel to be clean with good sized rooms, in good position re Fisherman's Wharf.  staff were responsive to any problems
review.negativeRemarks: all good
review.locationRemarks: about 2 blocks from Wharf - area overall is a little rough but this is just the area near the wharf - not the hotel - hotel in good position overall

review.title: Ok Hotel 2 blocks from Fishermans Wharf.
review.reviewText: Overall a good experience. We got a suite with 2 doubles and a sofa bed. Room was large with plenty of space. Some of the wall paper was peeling and they fixed by putting some clear tape over it. Really!?!?  They have free breakfast but with the great breakfast places literally a few feet from hotel we passed on hotels. Parking was a crazy $51 plus tax a night. Hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. Overall a good experience.
Good hotel close to the wharf and public transit.

review.title: Hotel is in a nice location
review.reviewText: The hotel door is only located on one side of the hotel.  If you are dropped off on the other side, then you will need to walk around to the hotel lobby.

review.title: Nice hotel. Good breakfast. Great vallet service.
review.reviewText: Very nice stay. Close to the warf. Friendly staff. Clean rooms.

review.title: Nice hotel, one block from Fisherman's Warf
review.reviewText: Everyone was very courteous and willing to help. The location of the hotel is fabulous. It is on a quiet street and yet one block away from Fisherman's Warf. We really enjoyed our stay and will be coming back.
review.positiveRemarks: The location and the great friendly staff
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast could be better. Not many options to choose from and too much processed food.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Warf is within a block. Madam Tussauds Wax Museum,SF Dungeon, Boudin Bakery, ferries to Alktraz, Pier 39 - all within walking distance

review.title: San Fran family stay
review.reviewText: Great stay, Central to trams and buses. Walking distance to Fishermans Wharf. Great breakfast choices. Hotel staff really helpful.  Use of the pool at the Holiday Inn next door.
review.negativeRemarks: More seats in the dining area would be helpful
review.locationRemarks: Great location, close to Fishermans Wharf, trams stops etc.  Very safe area of San Fran

review.title: Rafa's San francisco tour
review.reviewText: The hotel service was good, the one thing that I did not know was that not only we needed to rent a room, but also a parking space for my car. And the price for the parking space was more than if a rented a car for a day. (Rental car price 39.99 per day), (parking space 52.75 for every 24hrs). And not only that, but the valet guy instead of helping to take things out of the car or being alert to what was going on around him he was on the phone, I had to ask him where the carts where to load my bags up to my room.

review.title: Expect to be a Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Expect to be a Nice hotel, better with the refrigerator in the room. Overall is nice

review.title: Nice hotel close to the Wharf and transportation o
review.reviewText: We booked the hotel for a family get away with our son. Location was great for our trip; staff was helpful; breakfast was good; and rooms were comfortable and clean. I don't know what else to say except that if we come to San Francisco again we will definitely plan to stay at this hotel.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel was located near the Fisherman's Wharf area which made access to transportation; shopping; restaurants; and tours convenient.

review.title: Nice hotel two blocks away from Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: Great and friendly staff. Clean rooms and hotel. Offers a great continental breakfast. Nice hotel two blocks away from Fisherman's Wharf. Plenty of shopping, food and tourist attractions around.
review.negativeRemarks: Everything.
review.locationRemarks: Nice hotel two blocks away from Fisherman's Wharf. Plenty of shopping, food and tourist attractions around.

review.title: Excellent experience
review.reviewText: Great experience. Excellent stay with family. Truly enjoyed breakfast and family experience.

within walking distance  of fishermans wharf, and dining establishments.
transportation to and from convienient
This is my second time to stay in this hotel; the location is the best.
review.positiveRemarks: The location- easy access to most tourist spots & close to any kind of transportation.
review.negativeRemarks: Drainage in the bathtub & the smell in the bathroom.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: great location within walking distance to fishermans wharf area. hotel looks to be newly remodeled , however the bed wasn't very comfortable to us. The free breakfast and free wifi were two of the reasons we booked this hotel. The breakfast was good, except for the scrambled eggs which were some kind of powdered stuff. They also had omelettes which were better. I would stay there again😄

review.title: very good for the price
review.reviewText: This hotel was very good, i never stay at holiday inns but due to this last stay, I might consider in the future.

review.title: Excellent location, close to all major attractions
review.reviewText: Loved the location and atmosphere, staff was friendly and helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Definitely WILL return.
review.locationRemarks: All major attractions and restaurants are close by.

review.title: great location
review.reviewText: Perfect 2 walk to restaurants attractions cable car stores
Great hotel. Close to everything! Hotel staff very nice. Rooms are clean and big.

review.title: Excellent location with fantastic staff
review.reviewText: Only a 1 night stay so a limited experience and review but the location is great in this area if your looking to visit Pier 39, Embarcado area, Lombard St and the Columbus St area. Everything is within walking distance and you are next to the transit sytem for the longer journeys. Friendly and very helpful staff who made the stay easier and more comfortable. Will be returning for my next trip!
review.negativeRemarks: Adding Fridges a small fridge to the rooms would be very nice to have rather than getting ice repeatedly
review.locationRemarks: EXCELLENT location, several minutes from the Pier and many of the major attractions on the must see/do list

review.reviewText: We were stuck in a handicap room which made the bath very awkward. We are not handicapped and the bath counter was small. We used the bench in the shower for storage and had to move it every time we showered.
Decided to stay over in San Francisco so shopped for convenient hotel close by.  This hotel met all our criteria.

review.title: Great location, close to everything
review.reviewText: Was allowed to check in early, room was clean, staff very friendly and helpful
review.positiveRemarks: Loved the location, would stay here again
review.locationRemarks: Close to pier,

review.title: easy distance to many attractions
review.reviewText: It was good, especially with the added throng of people for Fleet Week. Walking to most of the attractions was easy. In other cases a short cab ride at a decent fare. Highly recommend this location.
review.locationRemarks: Too many to mention

review.title: Great hotel close to attractions
review.reviewText: Within two blocks of the bay this hotel is convenient and reasonably priced. The staff was helpful in arranging transportation to the airport and in getting around the area. The breakfast area was much improved over previous stays with a good selection of breakfast items. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting San Francisco.

review.title: Very convenient location
review.reviewText: This hotel is in a very good location . You can walk to just about anything. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Wish they had fridge or microwave. The complimentary breakfast is very good with lots of choices.
review.negativeRemarks: Refrigerator and microwaves in room
review.locationRemarks: You can walk to the Wharf and restaurants. Lot of shopping also.

review.title: Nice hotel close to Fisherman's Wharf.
review.reviewText: Clean, helpful staff, good breakfast. Only negative is most rooms had no view. Most windows looked out onto side of building.

review.title: Close to Fishermans Wharf
review.reviewText: Great location, room very nice, Bed and pillows great. Free breakfast-nice selection , but alot of stuff was not hot, no microwave to reheat!

review.title: Mediocore, not as advertised. Very poor reception
review.reviewText:
The Bellman saved the day as the management was utterly useless. We had to walk to three different versions of the Holiday Inn trying to find out which one we were actually booked into. No food available at the 24 hour dinning facility.

Reserved for three people but had only two beds, and they refused to supply the roll-away bed unless we paid extra.
review.negativeRemarks: The misrepresentation of facilities available.

review.title: Great location, nice rooms
review.reviewText: Very close to all the restaurants and shops near fisherman's wharf.  Very nice clean rooms.  Free breakfast was very good.  Nice lobby.
review.negativeRemarks: There is no view from the rooms, just over looking empty courtyard.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's wharf, Pier 39, Ghiradelli square all within walking distance.  Tram for E and F trains is right outside the hotel.

review.title: Very good minus no internet connection
review.reviewText: Hotel was very nice and close to Fishermen Wharf. Safe area to walk around.
For the price that they charge, they should at least provide free bottles of water in the room.

review.title: Nice Hotel close to good restaurants and Embarcado
review.reviewText: We had an easy walk to Ghiradelli square and Embarcadero.  Great restaurants near by
review.positiveRemarks: Close to everything and easy to grab a cab if needed
review.locationRemarks: Ghiradelli Square and Pier 39 near by also the wharf and Hyde street pier

review.reviewText: Booked last minute and this turned out to be a great choice.

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: Great location, with very friendly staff and very helpful concierges. Breakfast is convenient and above average and well stocked. We would definitely stay here again and will recommend to others.
Perfect location for Alcatraz Invitational Swim...

review.title: Close to fisherman wharf
review.reviewText:
Good breakfast service, quiet and clean rooms!!!
family friendly ....!!!

review.title: Comfortable room and convenient location
review.reviewText:
We stayed here for 4 nights, Check-in was fast and simple, breakfast was plentiful and we kept our bananas for lunch! The crowd at breakfast saw everyone enjoying the food. The concierge helped us get a great rate for an upgraded car at the local rental place. Room was nice enough and 3 blocks back from the water is a great base for San Francisco.

We even managed to walk all the way to and then over the Golden Gate Bridge from the hotel. Took most of the afternoon but a great way to see things.

Found the Soap Box Café at 1800 Hyde Street too, about a 15 minute walk up a very steep hill past Lombard St, but what a great find this café was! Great coffee was exactly what we needed so we went there every morning of the four days we stayed in San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: Easy and simple to get to everywhere.
review.negativeRemarks: Strong, espresso coffee for us coffee snobs...LOL.
review.locationRemarks: Near the water, Fishermans Wharf, long walks and cable cars and street cars!

review.title: Nice location and very friendly staff
review.reviewText: The hotel has a very nice location close to Fisherman's Wharf. The staff is very friendly and helpfull.
Hotel was nice but ridiculous to pay 49.00plus tax to park your car in a facility that you're already paying a high room rate.

review.title: Clean, Convenient, Comfortable Hotel
review.reviewText:
I was pleasantly surprised to find the Holiday Inn Express had practically everything I could want in a hotel. The staff was friendly; the lobby was clean, modern and welcoming; the room was just as clean, with a very comfy bed. Perhaps best of all is the hotel's location--just a few blocks from the Wharf, and Pier 39, the Aquatic park, various bus and streetcar stops, a grocery store (Safeway), and numerous other notable places. We really could not have stayed in a better area for seeing the most sights in SF. Plus their included breakfast was tasty and varied--not "cafeteria" quality at all. 

PS, there isn't a pool. That might be obvious to people, and they don't say they DO have one, but somehow I got the notion that basically every hotel has one and stupidly packed trunks and sandals that went unused. So just in case someone else made the same assumption, I figured I'd mention it. They do have a gym though, if you're into that.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, helpful staff, clean, comfortable room.
review.negativeRemarks: Realistically, not much. I was VERY impressed.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Wharf, Pier 39, boat tours, delicious restaurants, Ghirardelli Square, the Cannery, Lombard St, North Beach

review.reviewText: No swimming pool. Very small gym. Very limited breakfast. Not worth over $300/nt

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Great location and a very clean hotel.  Staff were friendly and helpful.  One block from the F-line and two blocks from the wharf.  Was here on business and pleasure and this location was perfect.
review.negativeRemarks: You could reduce the price.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the wharf and street car/trolley access

review.title: Nice hotel close to piers and ghiradelli square
review.reviewText: The holiday inn express was the perfect location.  Walking distance to ghiradelli square, fisher mans wharf, pier 39 and pier 33.  The breakfast included was perfect.  Not a ton of options but just enough.  The $50 to park the car was a bit much but every hotel in the city or near the airport charges for parking.  The valet service was quick and efficient.  Overall, a great stay and I would recommend staying here.  Location, location, location!
review.positiveRemarks: The location to everything and breakfast was included
review.negativeRemarks: Include the $50 parking fee in the price of the room
review.locationRemarks: Fantastic location near all the piers and ghiradelli square

review.title: THE STAFF
review.reviewText: THE STAFF THAT WAS HANDLING THE CARS FOR PARK WAS VERY BAD WITH THE WAY THEY DEALTH WITH THE GUEST. I WAS SENT TO THE WRONG HOTEL BECAUSE THE PARKING ATTENDANT GAVE ME THE WRONG INFORMATION WITHOUT CHECKING MY DOCUMENTS.
review.negativeRemarks: PARKING ATTENDANTS

review.title: great stay
review.reviewText: Very close or central to many sights to see in San Fran
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing

review.title: Fabulous hotel close to Dolby Theater!
review.reviewText: The hotel staff went out of their way to make our stay perfect! We arrived late night, and Melanie at the bar served us our dinner with a smile and great conversations about Hollywood!
review.locationRemarks: Dolby theater, wax museum, Chinese theater,

review.title: Very comfortable, homelike place. Great location t
review.reviewText: Enjoyed San Francisco - 4 days and nights - with this place as base. Every things is nearby. Reasonably good breakfast and friendly staff. This experience made me go for HI Express again in Chicago.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff. I mentioned my suitcase zipper problem to the housekeeping lady and she got me the maintenance guy who lent me the pliers to  fix it.
review.negativeRemarks: Very good for the price.
review.locationRemarks: Everything you want to do - shop, eat, sight seeing - is nerby

review.title: Good location to Wharf, bay, shopping,food,muni
review.reviewText: Staff was very helpful.  There were many breakfast choices.  The room and hotel were always neat and clean.  The bed was wonderful- I would like to know the brand and style.  Location was great.
review.negativeRemarks: Our room was next to pipes which made noise.  Our view was non-existent, another wall.  Elevators were often slow.
review.locationRemarks: Easy walk to Fisherman's Wharf with shopping, restaurants, ferry, aquarium, cable car and muni, Ghirardellis, biking, bay.

review.title: Nice, clean hotel
review.reviewText: This is a nice, clean hotel in a great location on Fisherman's Wharf. It's also the only one we could find with free breakfast, which was great! We were able to check in early and the hotel stored our luggage in a secure place on our checkout day so that we could fit in a few last activities before coming back to get on our shuttle to the airport.

review.title: Nice location but expensive
review.reviewText: Room rates were expensive given it is "Express".  parking is limited to valet parking and again very very expensive.
review.negativeRemarks: Pricing and breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Wharf

review.title: Well situated  good value hotel
review.reviewText: Really good hotel, very easy access to the places that we wanted to visit. Had a great time visiting San Francisco
review.positiveRemarks: Location. Cleanliness. Easy check in and out, had parking facilities if needed
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast was good with plenty of choice but the cooked part could have been better
review.locationRemarks: Short walk to Fisherman's Wharf and its attractions, close to bike rental and cable car stop. Easy access to buses to get Downtown

review.title: Good hotel in the heart of the action
review.reviewText: We had a great experience at this hotel.  We arrived before noon, and they allowed us to get checked in to a room when the normal check in wasn't until 3:00p.  The complimentary breakfast was also outstanding, and well stocked.  The location of the hotel puts you right near the Fishmen's Wharf, and within walking distance of many other attractions.  The only two frustrations I had was that the air conditioner didn't seem to cool the room off as much as I preferred, and the valet parking was around $60 per day (and there was no option to self park at the hotel).
review.positiveRemarks: Courteous staff, spacious room, location was awesome.
review.negativeRemarks: Parking could be cheaper.....
review.locationRemarks: Fishermen's Wharf is nearby, quick walk to Lombard Street, Pier 39

review.title: On the Wharf
review.reviewText: We enjoyed being close to Fisherman's Wharf in San Francisco.  The concierge was also extremely helpful in arranging tours and providing assistance for us.  The location was very close to the stops for the tours that we took.  We also were a block from the F bus line that connected us to the metro transportation system.  All in all, we enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn Express and would recommend it to friends and family.
review.positiveRemarks: Its location!  We felt we were right in the midst of the tourist section of the city.  My daughter also enjoyed the complimentary breakfasts.
review.negativeRemarks: The rates could have been less, but realize that all the hotels have to be competitive.
review.locationRemarks: Many activities including bike and Segway rentals, restaurants, souvenir shops, tour bus pick-up spots, Ghiradelli chocolate, and a cable car stop.

review.title: CLASSIC over-priced due to location
review.reviewText: Hotel smells. Hallways on 3rd floor smell like vomit. Room smells like smoke, even though hotel is no smoking hotel? Showers make horrible noise when turned on. Front desk staff on check-out were rude. Bed was uncomfortable! Not worth it! Will NEVER stay here again.

review.title: Nice Hotel, close to wharf
review.reviewText: Good stay, they need to open breakfast at 6:00 instead of 6:30

review.title: Great location, very clean hotel!
review.reviewText: Great hotel with perfect location--easy to walk to any destination in Fisherman's Wharf and just a short walk to the cable car connection.  They do charge for parking, but we didn't have a car so it didn't affect us.  The continental breakfast was actually really good with lots of selections including hot & cold items.  The rooms were very nice and comfortable.  The hotel staff were also very friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: easy to get to anything at Fisherman's Wharf

review.title: Location is advantageous but scanty.
review.reviewText: Being "Express" category, the hotel was not what I would expect. However, if efficiency is valued, the hotel is rated highly. However, my personal experiences were not impressive. Valet parking was quite expensive, especially where there are cheaper alternatives close by.

review.title: Older Hotel
review.reviewText: I had to hear my neighbor's conversation from 4:30 to 6:30 am. He was just talking normally, but the walls are so thin you can hear everything clearly. He was just on a conference call for work, but there's no insulation in the walls so you can hear EVERYTHING!!!

review.title: Walking distance to cable cars and Fisherman's Wha
review.reviewText: Very expensive valet parking! Breakfast was good. Great Location. Attractive hotel.

review.title: One-day layover perfection in San Francisco.
review.reviewText:
We flew in from China on the Beijing - SFO direct flight and we're really tired upon landing same day in a blustery and chilly city by the bay. Took a $55 taxi to the hotel, which sits near the corner of  North Point and Taylor Streets.  We were early, but gracious staff still let us check in and showed us up to the family suite.
Great size and comfort for this family of five!
review.positiveRemarks: The main room was big and catered well to our large family with young children.
review.negativeRemarks: The carpet should be changed.
review.locationRemarks: Great location. Three minute walk from Pier 39 and the famous F line trolley.

review.title: great room, but small
review.reviewText: Hotel was in great location, the room was very nice, only negative was that with two people, luggage and a king size bed there was not much space to move around.
review.negativeRemarks: larger rooms
review.locationRemarks: great location, right at fishermans wharf, with lots to do

review.title: Great stay.
review.reviewText: The Hotel was clean as well as the room. The staff was friendly and responsive. The hotel location was very close to Fishermans  Wharf and all the attractions there. You do not really need a car from this hotel as everything is within walking distance. Public transportation is readily available. I would stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: More seating area for breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: You are at fishermans wharf.

review.reviewText: Within walking distance to all tourist facilities

review.title: Very good location.
review.reviewText: We spent three nights there. We could walk to the sightseeing bus tour and we could walk down to Fisherman's Wharf, giving us alot of things to see nearby. We were pleasantly surprised at the breakfast in the morning. It was a well done self serve bar to serve a large crowd.
review.positiveRemarks: Location. Good service, we didn't have to wait too long for anything. They had valet parking, but make sure you book ahead as spaces are limited.
review.negativeRemarks: It was better than I expected.
review.locationRemarks: Location, close to Fisherman's wharf, sightseeing tours, restaurants, even close enough to Ghirardelli's to get a late night sundae.

review.title: Close to everything
review.reviewText: This hotel is in the middle of everything.  The free breakfast was the best I have ever had a hotel.  Whatever you want it is within two blocks of the hotel.  The place was very clean and very comfortable.

review.title: Great for tourists in San Francisco
review.reviewText: This hotel is close to Fishermans Wharf which makes it very good for the tourist as most activities start from this area. It is 2 blocks from the Cable Cars and also 2 blocks from Fishermans Wharf and the many San Francisco Bay cruises that are on offer. Also plenty of eateries and bars in this area ranging from great to so-so. Breakfast is a full hot breakfast of the standard mass produced variety. Eggs. bacon, pancakes. biscuits and gravy, cereal, yogurt, juice etc. not great quality but OK and part of the price so you can start the day filled up.
review.positiveRemarks: Location is great and in hotel is in good condition.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing really value for price.
review.locationRemarks: Tour buses, cruises, cable cars, historic street car, Madame Tussad, seafood eateries, naval museums, souvenior shopping.

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: This was a great hotel to stay in in San Francisco.  It was in a great location, near a lot of great restureants and attractions.  There was a lot of things to do and see that were close by (within walking distance).  It also had a great breakfast buffet (it had everything you would want to eat).  The rooms were clean and comfortable and it was very quiet.  The staff was also very friendly and helpful.  I would recommend this hotel.
This hotel was very artsy and immaculate.  Thank you for the wonderful stay.
Was in the main hallway on my floor and it was very noisy

review.title: Great Time in San Francisco
review.reviewText: Had a great time staff friendly and clean rooms. Not far from the wharf, walking distance . Close to different places to eat, your choice.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText:
Overall great experience. 

The #1 thing for me was location and cleanliness and both were met.
 
I found the fisherman's warf area is very accomodating if you plan on walking/biking to see the city. 

The walk to downtown / china town/ Little Italy was completely doable. The bike ride to the golden gate was easy.
A lot of the day tours originate from the fisherman's warf area making them much easier to plan for and not spend a lot of time traveling to their locations.

review.title: walking distance to pier 39!
review.reviewText: Clean, affordable, breakfast included and perfect walking distance from pier 39.  Parking is expensive $50 per night!!!

review.title: Fabulous hotel close to everything.
review.reviewText: The hotel was extremely comfortable and the room was stocked with all types of personal items (shampoo/conditioner and bathing sponge. The staff was courteous and helpful. The full breakfast was complimentary and very good. Great value, location and in and out parking privilege.

review.title: Great for a 2 day stay
review.reviewText: Wanted to stay close to the warf,  so wouldn't have to drive while I was there. Is close to cable car turn around,  close to lots of restaurants, lots of tourist attractions

review.title: Great hotel in a great location
review.reviewText: The hotel is in a great location to many sights and attractions. We were able to walk to most of the activities that we were doing during our stay.The free breakfast buffet was a plus. It does offer the same thing everyday, but there are many choices to choose from. Our room was in a quiet location on the second floor. The street seemed pretty quiet too. The room was very clean and the staff was friendly. Would definitely stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: Change some breakfast buffet items on different days
review.locationRemarks: Close to the cable car, Ghirardelli, Pier 39, Fisherman's Wharf, Alcatraz, Lombard Street and many restaurants.

review.title: Great location near transit
review.reviewText: A comfortable place to stay, near all the tourist locations, and close to transit which gets you everywhere (including the airport.)  The room was immaculate, the free breakfast substantial and varied (that is, not just a sweet roll and coffee, but omelets, sausage, pancakes, a wide selection of breads, juices, fruit, even biscuits and gravy.  A substantial start to the day.) My only reservation was the noisy ventilation system in the bathroom, and heating system in the room.  Otherwise we were quite pleased.
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom fan was very noisy--and came on with the light--waking my partner.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Wharf, of course, but also a jumping off place for ferries to Sausalito, etc, and bike rides across the Golden Gate bridge.

review.title: Nice hotel, close to Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText:
Overall the hotel was nice. The reception staff were excellent, always greeting us with a smile and very willing to help with any request.
Breakfast was included. The breakfast was basic but nice, with a choice of both hot and cold food and drinks.
It was a quick walk to Fisherman's Wharf.
The room had no safe which was annoying. (All other hotels we stayed in on our holiday had a safe.)
review.negativeRemarks: Install an in-room safe in each room

review.title: Nice hotel three blocks from the wharf.
review.reviewText: Perfect location, great breakfast to get your day going.

review.title: Excellent location
review.reviewText: We really loved San Francisco and were pleased we chose the Holiday Inn Express & Suites.  The room was clean and comfortable and the coffee making facility in the room was welcome. Excellent breakfast.  The concierge was very helpful with suggestions for seeing the sights.  The hotel staff were friendly and helpful.  The location was ideal; only a short walk to Fisherman's Wharf and its attractions and to the cable car terminus and Big Bus Tour terminus. Plenty of restaurants nearby.
review.positiveRemarks: Ideal location.  Walking distance to many attractions and only a short taxi ride to Union Square. The breakfast was excellent.
review.locationRemarks: Visit the sea lions at Pier 39, take the boat trip to Alcatraz, pick up the night bus tour.  We walked from Coit Tower to the hotel.

review.title: Super nice staff
review.reviewText: Comfy pillow and bed.  Close to everything. Friendly staff.

review.title: Great location; friendly staff
review.reviewText: When we arrived late at night at the hotel we were informed that the mini suite that we booked had some damage from previous guests and that it would not be ready for us on the first night.  The front desk staff was very accommodating and were able to provide us with another room that would fit our family.  They brought us a roll away bed and a refrigerator promptly upon our request.  Although our previously booked room would have been ready for us the second night of our stay, we ended up not changing rooms for the remainder of our visit to San Francisco. The room they provided for us fit our needs just fine and they provided complimentary parking for us because we were inconvenienced.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  There was quite a variety offered for breakfast and the hotel was clean and quiet.  If you like the Warf ar
review.locationRemarks: A quick walk to the Fisherman's Warf area with so much to do and see. Ghirardelli Square is within walking distance as is the stop for the Cable Cars.

review.title: Great location San francisco
review.reviewText: Excellent location walking distance to all main attractions and restaurants staff helpful rooms are updated very modern best buffet breakfast in town highly recommend this hotel to anyone pleasurable stay thanks Expedia

review.title: Pleasant surprise and fabulous location.
review.reviewText: Not a lot to choose from for breakfast, but it's free.
review.negativeRemarks: a bell boy

review.title: Easter weekend
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice and clean walking distance to everything nice experience

review.title: Nice spring break
review.reviewText:
Enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn Express during spring break.  Excellent staff.  Breakfast buffet was impressive
Thank you
review.positiveRemarks: Location, excellent service, very friendly staff
review.locationRemarks:
Fisherman's wharf
Chocolate factory
Cable car
Bay view
Walking distance to everything

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: We loved the short walk to Fishermans Wharf, hotel is modern and clean, the breakfast was great.

review.title: Nice Hotel Near Fishermans Wharf
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel.  Hotels is very clean and looks new.  The location was very good, walking distance to Fishermans Wharf and shopping.  We would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Condition of hotel was very nice and location was good.

review.title: Great location.
review.reviewText: Spent two nights. The location was excellent to get around the hot spots of San Francisco. We did not have a car but all the forms of transportation easily available right near the hotel. Rooms were comfortable and breakfast good. I would stay here again on next trip to San Francisco.
review.locationRemarks: Excellent location:: Ghiradelli, Pier 39  Exploratorium, Lombard St, Chinatown, Alcatraz, CA of Science, Painted Lady Houses w/in walking/public trans

review.title: Watch your credit card,
review.reviewText:
Watch your credit Card, they put through charges that never occurred...still trying to get it corrected.

Rooms where cleaned, but they never replenished items.

review.title: Great Location!
review.reviewText:
I had read the reviews about this hotel before booking it and Expedia reviews have proved to be very reliable, as always! Thanks Expedia!

Our family of 3 stayed at Holiday Inn Express during Canadian March Break and it was a very pleasant experience.
The staff was very friendly and helpful, the breakfast was plentiful, the room was modern.
review.positiveRemarks:
Location! 
Breakfast!
Helpful and friendly staff!
review.negativeRemarks: I cannot think of anything.
review.locationRemarks: Close to Fisherman's Wharf, Cable cars, bus stops, restaurants, and grocery stores! This is the best hotel location one can get.

review.title: Walkable to everything
review.reviewText:
So close to pier and all kinds of nice restaurants.
Across street is a sports bar that's really good.

review.title: Very nice hotel @ Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: We arrived at the hotel prior to regular check-in because of an early flight; however, the employee that waited on us held our luggage & allowed us to check-in a couple of hours early. She greeted us with such a warm & welcoming smile. I highly recommend this hotel & would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Very nice stay
review.reviewText: Vacation to San Fran was great, including the room!
review.locationRemarks: Close to so much!  Walked to little Italy, China Town and of course the wharf.

review.title: Good hotel in an excellent location
review.reviewText: Ideally situated on Fisherman's wharf, this hotel delivers what is expected from this chain.  Good, dependable accommodation, with a free breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, plus we got upgraded to a mini-suite
review.negativeRemarks: Coffee makers in the rooms use packs of sugar, sweetener, stirrer, etc, but only ONE coffee whitener.  No good if you both drink white coffee.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's wharf is buzzing!  Great restaurants, Cable cars, shops, and entertainment.

review.title: Location is perfect ..
review.reviewText:
Short walk to the wharf.  The hotel staff was very friendly, rooms were very comfortable and the breakfast was pretty good too.  The 24 hour parking seems ridiculously priced but I am sure it is the same everywhere $112.00 for two days seems excessive though.
I will certainly look to book here first for any future trip to San Francisco
review.negativeRemarks: price of parking.....
review.locationRemarks: Best food and fun a block walk away...Fisherman's Wharf

review.title: Great breakfast buffet! Check-in was super quick!
review.reviewText: The lady at the front desk was awesome. We felt like she was a long time friend. Very helpful and kind. Great room with views of SF warf area. Room was very clean & beds were comfortable. Buy your tickets from the hotel for all attractions super cheap & lots of bonus stuff!

review.title: Ok hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel close to everything. Hotel parking over the top expensive and not included in cost of stay. Room wasn't super clean, coins and dust bunnies in corners so could tell just quick vacuum done. Staff super nice and helpful. Breakfast was awesome! So many choices.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our stay near Fisherman's Warf.  There was a lot to do but our time at the hotel was relaxing and peaceful.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We didn't like the room the first night so they found a better room that was always quiet and very comfortable.  When we wanted to explore, they helped us find our way around.  We hope top stay here again in the furture.
review.positiveRemarks: We enjoyed having a big breakfast before we took off for a busy day seeing the sites.

review.reviewText:
Booked this hotel on Expedia.. selected it at $181.... then was charged $254???

Front desk is incredibly inflexible. 

Also.. there is a strange odor throughout the place... kind of that "old" smell.  Avoid.

review.title: Wonderful location for a family vacation
review.reviewText: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Express and Suites Fisherman's Wharf for five nights. The room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast was included and very good. We were able to easily walk to all the must see attractions. Each morning we walked to Pier 39 and visited the sea lions. We took the boat to Alcatraz from Pier 33 and the Sunset Bay Cruise from Pier 43. We went to Ghiardelli Square a few times and Boudin's bread factory and restaurant. We also walked to the Cable Car stop and rode the cable car downtown. There is so much to do and see in San Francisco and we loved staying at Fisherman's Wharf!
review.positiveRemarks: We liked the staff, the room and the breakfast but most of all the location.
review.negativeRemarks: Next time we might ask for a room with a view. Our room's window faced a brick wall.
review.locationRemarks: There are wonderful gift shops and restaurants all through out Fisherman's Wharf. We also took a double decker bus tour- a great way to see SF!

review.title: Very Good Location
review.reviewText: Pleasant stay, good customer service. Very Good Location, Value for money, excellent breakfast, very good for families with kids.
review.positiveRemarks: Very Good Location, Value for money, excellent breakfast, very good for families with kids
review.negativeRemarks: They should provide a Shuttle service to Pier 33 and Pier 39.
review.locationRemarks: Pier 39 and 33

review.title: Great hotel, great location.
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our stay.  The hotel location was perfect for transit to most SF attractions.  We would have given a perfect rating but the furniture configuration in the room was a little awkward.  The desk was centred on the wall and the chair made it difficult to move around the room. The desk  and chair should be tucked into the corner near the window.
review.negativeRemarks: Length of breakfast hours.
review.locationRemarks: Perfect for Fishermans Wharf and access to trolley cars, cable cars and buses.

review.reviewText: Everything was good. Great location. The hotel did have a weird smell though.

review.title: Location Location Location!
review.reviewText: 1.5 blocks from Fisherman's Wharf and all the public transit (Cable cars, trolly cars, busses) you'd ever need to see the whole Bay area. The hotel is not ritzy, but it's very clean, well-maintained, and the staff bends over backwards to help. Add the included hot and substantial breakfast buffet, and I'd book there again in a New York minute! Loved the place. ZERO issues and a comfortable and safe place to rest up at the end of the day. Take it.... don't hesitate. It's great! Even the free Wi-Fi in the rooms was fast and easy.
review.positiveRemarks: So neat and such helpful staff, and that great hot breakfast buffet every morning. And its close proximity to Fisherman's Wharf.
review.negativeRemarks: The one thing we wished we had was a small fridge. It's available, at a cost, but it would have been nice to have been included.
review.locationRemarks: Perfect! Close to the Wharf, transportation, restaurants, shops. Honestly, the location was perfect. Easy walk to everything.

review.title: Fisherman's Wharf Holiday Inn
review.reviewText:
Thought the hotel was pretty good.  It had a good location close to a tour bus pickup office.

The breakfast wasn't much to write home about but it was free.

The lifts were very slow particularly in the mornings.  I almost always
used the fire escape / stairs as it vastly quicker than the lift.

The instructions on the back of the door to begin using 
the lights, tv etc were a little out of date.

The instructions for the phone to contact reception where also
out of date.

However the room was very comfortable and in a good location.
The staff were very good,  helpful and available.
review.negativeRemarks:
instructions in the room to access
- electricity
- phone
review.locationRemarks: within 50m of fisherman's wharf, tour bus almost round the corner.

review.title: Good location in Fisherman Wharf
review.reviewText: Excellent service from front desk, allowed us to check in early as we had an early flight and stored our luggage on our check out date till we needed it for our late flight.
review.positiveRemarks: Good location, free wifi and breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Near cable car stop and beach, near Pier 39 for ferry and sightseeing boats, and easy walk to Pier 33 for Alcatraz crossing. Near F line stop

review.title: Great stay!
review.reviewText: My husband and I spent 9 nights here on vacation and were very happy with the hotel.  The hotel is clean and comfortable.  The staff is great and the breakfast was good.  We should stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Very comfortable rooms and great staff.
review.negativeRemarks: A little variety in the breakfast would be appreciated.
review.locationRemarks: Everything is near by!  The cable cars, Fisherman's Wharf, shops, restaurants, public trans and there's a Walgreen's right around the corner.

review.title: Walking distance to fishermans wharf.
review.reviewText: Nice room. Great breakfast.  The only negative is you hear doors shutting, the guests voices, and the maids vacuuming.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Great place to stay to take in the best of this beautiful city, San Francisco.  Breakfast was basic but a real bonus.

review.title: Convenient to Pier 39 and great breakfast.
review.reviewText: My son and I stayed the night of Feb. 1, 2015 to do touristy things in the area.  The room was clean and comfortable, and the hotel location was very convenient Fisherman's Wharf attractions and to restaurants.  The beds included both soft and firm pillows, and there was Bath & Bodyworks shampoo/conditioner. My son was very impressed with the extensive breakfast options-- bacon, sausage, pancakes, toast/muffins/biscuits/bagels, cinnamon rolls, yogurt, juice, coffee, milk, hard boiled and scrambled eggs. We were able to leave our car parked there until 6PM on the day of checkout.  The place has a lot going for it!
review.positiveRemarks: Great location, great complimentary breakfast and very clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Parking fee both on the Expedia information and on hotel website said $45, but it was actually $48.  Not a lot, but a bit annoying..
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to Pier 39, the Wharf, and Alcatraz cruises.

review.title: Close to pier 39 but bath room stunk
review.reviewText: Not very happy with room closet was broken microwave was broken bath room had a bad smell

review.title: Had a great stay - breakfast was awesome!!
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean and tidy and the staff were helpful.  The breakfast every morning was top notch!  The room was great and we were given a free upgrade when we arrived which was much appreciated.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel was very clean and tidy and the staff were helpful.  Top notch breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: An in hotel restaurant would have been awesome for evening meals or lunches.
review.locationRemarks: Fisherman's Wharf is five minutes walk away.  Seafood heaven, Alcatraz cruises, bus tours, push bike hire. Everything that is San Fran is there.

review.title: Holiday Inn review
review.reviewText: Excellent location, we were pleased by the quality of the rooms and the helpfulness of the staff. the breakfast quality was very good, only complaint was room was not vacuumed daily. We would certainly stay again

review.title: Walk to Fishermans wharf
review.reviewText: Parking is $50 a day. To expensive, but nice hotel besides that.
Great location close to fisherman's wharf with access to many of the bus lines. Hotel was a little noisy, but that is more due to other guests than the hotel itself.

review.title: Nice Hotel in an Excellent Location
review.reviewText: The hotel is situated right in the heart of Fisherman's Wharf. From here, you will be able to go to all tourist locations across San Francisco via the use of Muni public transportation. Attractions such as Pier 39, Ghirardelli Square, Aquarium of the Bay and Bay Area cruise embarkation location are at a walking distance. You have a lot of options to eat including the famous Boudin restaraunt near this hotel. In addition, the hotel provides breakfast buffet. Overall, I had a nice experience at this place.
review.negativeRemarks: Flexible check-out timing

review.title: Location, Location, Location
review.reviewText: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Express at Fisherman's Wharf over the weekend of Jan. 14-18. Had a nice room that had a street view (we had to ask to get this view). Most of the hotel's rooms face a courtyard. Since this was our 1st trip to SF, so we wanted to be able to see outside. The hotel staff was very pleasant and accommodating at every turn. The breakfast was pretty standard for this type of hotel, but very busy while we were there. A lot of people use the free breakfast. We opted to go to some of the local eateries within a 2 minute walk everyday except our departure day. The best thing about this hotel is it's location. You are a 5 minute walk to everything: the Wharf, street cars, MUNI, restaurants, and sightseeing. Should we go back to SF, we would probably stay here again. Overall, it was a pleasant experience!
review.locationRemarks: MUNI (mass transit), Fisherman's Wharf, Restaurants, Ghiradelli Square, Pier 41, Hyde Pier, Alcatraz Landing (10 minute walk), Pier 39

review.title: On business trip
review.reviewText:
Surprised by cleanliness and updated rooms.  
A little noisy (thin walls)
Located conveniently -easy walk to shops, restaurant.
Slow elevator.
Great breakfast. 
noisy fan in bathroom.

Great deal thru Expedia. Good location, clean, good free breakfast compared to other free hotel breakfast.  Staff friendly. You can leave your car there til 6 pm on the day of checkout which was nice since it's $50 to park there. Rooms small bit not there much. Pillows uncomfortable.  Staff super friendly.

review.title: Great location!
review.reviewText: Overall we had a great experience at this hotel. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. The free breakfast was good as well. But the location was fantastic! I would definitely recommend this hotel to a friend.

Check in was smooth, front desk personnel pleasant and friendly. 
We had 2 rooms and as we were not picky about having connecting rooms, we simply wanted the same floor they got us hooked up and checked in at noon.
Breakfast great option but get there early, plenty of seating until about 0800... then a madhouse!
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was a nice bonus as only 2 of our party require actual food the others simply had a great visit and coffee.
review.locationRemarks: Awesome location. For any price you can't beat it!

review.title: SFO stay great
review.reviewText: Kids loved the food selection at breakfast. I liked the location the most, walking distance to cable car stations, bus stops, public transpo and restaurants. We wished we had a better view though. Overall, we had a great time.
Nice location near fishermans wharf .  Good staff and nice breakfast.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Great location, one block from Fishermans Wharf. On convenient bus routes to bridge and downtown ( we didn't have car)). Very close also to two cable car lines. Only comment about hotel was breakfast one morning, ran out of most food due to how busy hotel was. Didnt affect us since we had eaten but if I had come down at 845 instead I would have been annoyed that the staff couldn't keep up with the demand. Otherwise food was good with healthy choices and whole grains. Maybe lose the "white death" processed sugar Danish and corn syrup ! Would definitely return.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything. Didn't need pool, and maybe this is why there weren't too many young families here ?
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast quantities at times.
review.locationRemarks: Fishermans wharf. Ferry to alcatraz and sausalito, good bus routes and cable car lines just a block away.

review.reviewText: Great hotel to the price.  Very close to Pier 39 and within walking distance to Union Square.  Would defiintely stay there again.

review.title: Hotel is close to fishermens wharf
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice rooms could use some updated wallpaper. Breakfast was very good. We walked down to fisherman's wharf in minutes. We did think the $51 valet parking was a bit too much, but we were glad they did provide this service. At least we knew our car was in a safe place. We would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Great location and Room
review.reviewText: Loved the location and cleanliness of the hotel.  Room was comfortable and nice.  The only complaint would be the bathroom is a little small but other then that everything was great.  Sooo close to fishermans warf and Pier 39.  I would stay here again for sure.
review.negativeRemarks: Convert tub showers to just nice showers no tub.
review.locationRemarks: 2 Blocks from Fishermans Warf and 4 blocks from Pier 39.

review.title: Best Wharf hotel! !
review.reviewText: Great stay. Close to everything. Beautiful view of a parking lot, but wasnt in hotel long enough to worry about that. Loved this place! ! !

review.title: Good location at Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: Excellent location near the Wharf, cable cars, bus stops and shopping.  A nice dining area with a free hot breakfast in the mornings.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Unfortunately we scheduled our holiday in San Francisco at the same time as a huge convention (apparently pharmaceutical companies) so the hotels - including this one - doubled and tripled their rates.  For the amount charged, it would have been nice to have a room with a decent view and perhaps a small refrigerator and micro-wave (none provided).   It was nice to have an in-room coffee-maker, but we weren't supplied with enough creamers for more than 2 cups of coffee.  The beds seemed somewhat small, perhaps double beds instead of queen, and the fitted bottom sheets were smaller still, coming loose from the mattress during the night.  The comforters were tucked into the foot of the bed so tight it was like being short-sheeted, unable to pull the covers up over your shoulders without  pulling out the covers from the foot of the bed.  These little inconveniences would be nothing if the rates were reasonable, but at such a premium price they became noticeable.
review.negativeRemarks: see above
review.locationRemarks: Restaurants, shopping, sight-seeing buses, Alcatraz tours, cable cars.

review.title: Great hotel for the money and close to embaradero
review.reviewText: Good price and close to attractions at pier 39. Close to bus and cable line. Double beds worked for our family of four although two queens would of been much better. A small sacrifice for the great price and location. Valet parking is a rip off as its $45 a night plus tax so $53 a night. That pads in to your nightly price, however with the free breakfast, that makes up for it. Take public transportation if you can with your family and better to fly into Oakland and take the BART. Overall the hotel was clean, friendly staff, and accommodating. Will defiantly stay at this hotel again if we want this part of town again.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: The hotel exceed my expectations. It is close to everything, just steps away from Fisherman Wharfs. The room is not big but if you are not planning on spending the whole day at the room it's perfect. It was clean, and everything works. The free breakfast was a plus.
review.negativeRemarks: Bed was a little uncomfortable.
review.locationRemarks: Hollywood Café, WOW! best breakfast in the area.

review.title: Thanksgiving 2014
review.reviewText: The staffs from the front desk to the cleaning staff are very courteous and pleasant.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: SF for the weekend and had a fabulous time.  The continental breakfast was good, service full

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: The location of this hotel is really good. Very close walking distance to the Pier and restaurants.  The breakfast selection was also very good.  The view was not great however, we looked out to another room across the way and the room was just standard.

review.title: A family for my 60th Birthday.
