The price was right and hotel was very easy to get around so you did not spent extra time there if you did not want to. Free continental breakfast was not bad - better than what is offered at many other hotels. Rooms were quiet and clean and staff was friendly. Downsides: No indoor pool at this location, 4th floor rooms don't necessarily have a view, and cable selection is just OK. Parking is super expensive - do not stay here if must have a car.

review.title: Not too Impressed
review.reviewText: The room overall was ok..however, the view from the room window was HORRIBLE! Especially for a couple spending Valentines weekend there. We had a view of a roof top surrounded by windows of other rooms.

review.title: Fun Night
review.reviewText: My boyfriend took me to San Francisco for my birthday. The Holiday Inn Express was great. It was affordable, right next to Fisherman's Wharf, and had valet parking. The breakfast buffet wasn't spectacular but still better than most hotels that aren't over the top fancy.

review.title: Nice hotel close to Fisherman's Wharf, but comes with some sacrifices
review.reviewText: The hotel is neat looking and is rather clean and presentable. However, the room lacks common amenities such as wireless Internet (Ethernet was mandatory), refrigerator, and microwave oven. The view is terrible; all that can been seen out the window is other hotel room windows. Also, the only parking available is valet parking, which is expensive, and greatly increases the perceived cost of the stay. Nevertheless, it is a nice, clean hotel. It is also very close to Fisherman's Wharf, which is the best part about it. You can be on Pier 39 in about 10 minutes of walking or less.

review.title: Will definately go back!!!!
review.reviewText: Upon arriving, the front desk was extremly helpful and friendly. Rooms were immaculate and very quiet. Will definately stay again!!

review.title: Good Hotel for a great price
review.reviewText: Went to San Francisco on vacation and this was a great hotel for a bargain. It was in a great location and it was quite and clean. Great breakfast.

review.title: Service
review.reviewText: Breakfast was a disaster, the buffets were completely empty, had to go and look for someone to replenish. Variety was poor. Saving water for the sake of enviornment means do not change towels when hang up. So why change?

review.title: For New Years not bad
review.reviewText: Stayed for New Years Eve and didn't see much of the hotel. It was nice that their sister hotel was right across the street cause my hotel didn't have parking spots open. Staff was friendly and its in a great location.

review.title: Pleased with the visit
review.reviewText: We stayed at the hotel the last week of 2008 through New Year's Day. The overall stay was great and the location is ideal for tourists. Our room did smell like smoke one night, assumably because someone was smoking in another room. Otherwise the room was comfortable. Best asset: the free continental breakfast. Standard fare, but welcoming in the morning when you don't want to pay for a meal out. The fresh fruit hit the spot. If you are more of a sightseer and don't spend a lot of time in the hotel, this is an affordable place to get some sleep.

review.title: Super position and cheap cheap cheap!
review.reviewText: Hotel was great. Super position for Fisherman's wharf and Alcatraz etc. Just round the corner from the tram and easy access into the centre. Hotel was in good condition and breakfast was brilliant! Cleaners were a little lazy in their cleanliness and we often had to get rid of breakfast trays ourselves or trash, but that wasn't a big problem as there were recycling areas on the way out. Hotel was always helpful and provide a shuttle service to the airport which is 14 dollars per person.. which saved us over 20 dollars! Washing facilities are at the nearby bigger holiday inn, but it's only 100 metres away and they have a good laundrette area. All in all, good location and great hotel, it would help if they had a bar or better refreshment machines. I would recommend this hotel

review.title: Good location and helpful staff
review.reviewText: We (2 adults 2 kids) stayed in Dec 08. Location is excellent, and the staff were helpful. The breakfast arrangement (the only catering provided) is underwhelming but acceptable. Watch out for the parking fee per day if you bring your own car, but all hotels seem to charge similar in the area. It's the price you pay for convenience.

review.title: Wonderful Staff!
review.reviewText: The staff at the hotel was very helpful. Whenever we had a question about the location of things, they were very eager to help and give directions. The hotel is in a great location to the wharf as well! I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit San Francisco!

review.title: Nice and cosy hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was very friendly, I got there around 1:30 am and the staff greeted me very friendly. The room was comfortable also. It is located like two block from the pier so it only takes 5~7 min to go there. One down side is that no refrigerator in the room.

review.title: Will use again
review.reviewText: We loved this hotel.Good location, comfortable clean room, pleasant helpful staff, good buffet breakfast. We used it last year and returned this year and will use when we are in San Francisco again. We have used other hotels in the city and prefer this one.

review.title: Very good experience
review.reviewText: The parking was expensive but they all are in the area. The hotel was nice and the staff was very friendly. The hot food on the buffet was not very good. Overall we would stay there again.

review.title: Great place on the warf
review.reviewText: Convenient to all Well kept

review.title: Nice hotel, good service, good location
review.reviewText: Great location. Very quiet. The hot breakfast bar was good. You can walk to the cable car, Trolley and it is right at Fisherman's Wharf. The only drawback is that the parking is really expensive, but that is true at all the hotels there. We used street and other parking lots and saved a lot of money.

review.title: great
review.reviewText: great

review.title: Definately Good for the money
review.reviewText: Reasonable room prices which includes a sufficent breakfast that saves at least $10 per person per day. Location is perfect for Fishermans Wharf attractions and close to Tram start location. Service was good and free internet access was a bonus.

review.title: Perfect Location
review.reviewText: This hotel was great, breakfast was more that you could ask for and the front desk service was very helpful in getting around the city. It was in a perfect location.

review.title: Very nice hotel to stay in the center of San Francisco
review.reviewText: Very nice location in the Fisherman's wharf, close to cable car.

review.title: Will go back again!
review.reviewText: Loved this hotel!! Breakfast was fabulous!! Loved those cinnamon rolls - coffee was weak but 2 starbucks around the corner. Bed was so comfy, everything was clean, soap smelled lovely, staff was friendly, overall a great experence!! DONT BUY A SODA FROM THE MACHINE!! $3 gets you less than what $1 will get you at Safeway (also aorund the corner).

review.title: Great Location!
review.reviewText: The hotel was convenient to everything! The breakfast buffet was good and saved us $$$.

review.title: Neat Hotel in great location
review.reviewText: Found this hotel the best for the money . Good value all round for budgeting travelers . Great breakfast from 6.30 the rooms really neat and tidy. I'd say recently renovated throughout,it was just two blocks from the middle of Fisherman's Wharf. I would stay there next time I am in San Francisco .

review.title: Absolutely the greatest location!
review.reviewText: The hotel is perfectly located, clean and friendly. The front desk staff performed above and beyond the line of duty! The warm breakfast is a special treat, the only negative being the sort of plastic omelets ......... perhaps scrambled would be fresher looking??? Everything else was just fine, and after all, the price is right, eh?

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The room was big, and it was only one block from Fisherman's Wharf. The included breakfast was very good as well.

review.title: Great location!
review.reviewText: Overall a good service. The desk staff were very helpful. The waste at breakfast though was rather shocking even though it was all recycled. But to have paper plates and cups with plastic cutlery EVERY breakfast with some people using lots of plates each time seemed so wasteful.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: This hotel is only a few steps away from the Fisherman's Wharf and and one of the cable car lines. Very conveinent especially since it's not worth renting a car in San Francisco. Accomodations were pretty good, our first room was tiny and staff were more than happy to change rooms without hesitation. The continental breakfast was decent on whole, but there are lineups so don't wait till the last minute. They have 2 computers in the lobby with free internet which is great, but again there is always a line. Hotel staff were amazing with tour trip recommendations, directions, food suggestions etc.. There is also a Safeway grocery store just down the street so again, I would definately go back based on Location, Location, Location!!!

review.title: Grossly overpriced budget hotel
review.reviewText: We stayed two nights and paid an exhorbitant price for what turned out to be a budget hotel. No assistance available to help with the luggage. Both mornings breakfast was a shambles... cardboard trays, plastic knives & forks, paper plates etc. Food variety and standard was poor, service bad. Very slow queue to get food. Nowhere to sit to eat breakfast with all tables used up, other guests sitting eating off their knees in lounge chairs in the foyer of the hotel while others carried their breakfast to their rooms. Rooms were clean and adequate and location was good. Free internet (2 PCs provided) not working on first night. Might be reasonable value at a third of the price we paid and go elsewhere for breakfast. As with most San Francisco hotels, parking was expensive. In summary, for the price, we paid we would have expected a lot more.

review.title: Awesome location!
review.reviewText: You can't find a better deal in San Fran Wharf area. The location was awesome for what you pay for. Walking distance to everything! Sights, restaurants, shopping, transportation! The hotel also offers a full complimentary breakfast with eggs, bacon, sausage, muffins, juice, coffee. Not just the typical stuff for a free breakfast. The free internet access at the computer stations in the lobby were great for printing boarding passes and checking emails. The front desk was most helpful giving directions to get around. Although there was no bar in the lobby, Knuckles, the sports bar right across the street was just perfect. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting San Fran. Check it out yourself!

review.title: Good location near the wharf!
review.reviewText: Overall we were very statisfied with our hotel choice. Quiet - with a good contiental breakfast....We were within walking distance to the wharf and all of its attractions. Good restraurants nearby and easy access to public transportation...

review.title: A Fabulous Hotel in the middle of Fisherman's Wharf with Complimentary Full American Breakfast.
review.reviewText: I was extremely impressed with this hotel.The staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel was very clean and quiet. And you couldn't beat the location right in the middle of Fisherman's Wharf. The full american breakfast that is included in the price of the room was alot more than I expected. Scrambled eggs,omelettes, bacon, sausage, yogurt, biscuits & gravy, cereals, bagels, muffins, toast, fruit, juice, coffee and great cinnamon rolls. For my family of 4 this saved me at least $100 a day if I had to pay for this at any other hotel in San Francisco. Free high speed internet access. Free use of computers in business center.Free fitness center.Very comfortable beds. This is the best value on any hotel I have ever stayed at in San Francisco.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Customer service went above and beyond their duties to help us get around town.
